channel.title: Comments for Leave Room for Dessert

item.title: Comment on About Me by Ruth
item.dc:creator: Ruth
item.description: Hi Anita, took a pandemic, but finally got around to making your cinnamon scroll. Bloody brilliant. Most difficult part was finding the flour and yeast Trust you are keeping well and safe. Ruth Lyons (still @ Garvan but working from home)
item.content:encoded:
Hi Anita, took a pandemic, but finally got around to making your cinnamon scroll. Bloody brilliant. Most difficult part was finding the flour and yeastü§£
Trust you are keeping well and safe. Ruth Lyons (still @ Garvan but working from home)

item.title: Comment on V8 Cake by Debbie
item.dc:creator: Debbie
item.description: I was so intimidated by the recipe... but it was per my sons request that I make this for his birthday. I followed your recipe and I had success! It was very challenging, I am a self taught home baker. Thanks for sharing your experience. I wanted to add a photo but couldn‚Äôt find how to do it.
item.content:encoded:
I was so intimidated by the recipe… but it was per my sons request that I make this for his birthday. I followed your recipe and I had success! It was very challenging, I am a self taught home baker. Thanks for sharing your experience.
I wanted to add a photo but couldn‚Äôt find how to do it.

item.title: Comment on Caramel Slice by Jamieanne
item.dc:creator: Jamieanne
item.description: Hi Anita! I was just introduced to your blog today by your sister! Your niece is in my son‚Äôs kindy class! I just wanted to stop by and say hello to a fellow foodblogger, and also this caramel slice looks amazingly delicious! Loving the darkness of the caramel (the caramel layer in so many caramel slices is way too light-coloured; I much prefer the darker versions! )!
item.content:encoded: Hi Anita! I was just introduced to your blog today by your sister! Your niece is in my son‚Äôs kindy class! I just wanted to stop by and say hello to a fellow foodblogger, and also this caramel slice looks amazingly delicious! Loving the darkness of the caramel (the caramel layer in so many caramel slices is way too light-coloured; I much prefer the darker versions! üòÅ)!
